Package controllers

Class RegisterSubscriberController

java.lang.Object
controllers.RegisterSubscriberController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAware
public class RegisterSubscriberController extends Object implements ClientAware
Controller for the staff-facing registration screen. Handles input validation and communicates with the server to register a new subscriber.

  • Method Details

    • setClient

      public void setClient(ClientController client)
      Injects the active client instance used for server communication.
      Specified by:
      setClient in interface ClientAware
      Parameters:
      client - the shared ClientController instance

    • handleRegisterClick

      private void handleRegisterClick()
      Called when the "Register Subscriber" button is clicked. Validates the input fields and sends the new subscriber to the server if valid.

    • clearErrors

      private void clearErrors()
      Hides all error labels before re-validating fields.

    • showStatusFromServer

      public void showStatusFromServer(String message, boolean success)
      Displays the server response message in the status label. If registration was successful, disables all input fields and the register button to prevent further editing.
      Parameters:
      message - the message returned from the server (success or error)
      success - true if registration succeeded, false otherwise

    • showDuplicateError

      public void showDuplicateError(String field)
      Shows duplicate-field error received from the server and re-enables the Register button.
      Parameters:
      field - one of: "username", "email", "phone", "id", "vehicle"
